price: 22. Et Nous avons rendu le Coran facile à méditer. Est-il donc quelqu’un pour y réfléchir ?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
